description: This file contains function prototypes for the Slap Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) component, including creation, removal, object enrollment, initialization, and reset functions.

methods.name: SlapCreateSrvComponent
methods.description: Creates a SLAP service component with provided container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: SlapScoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the SLAP SCO object.

methods.name: SlapScoRemove
methods.description: Removes a SLAP SCO object instance.

methods.name: SlapScoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the SLAP SCO instance.

methods.name: SlapScoReset
methods.description: Resets the SLAP SCO object to its default state.
